text: pAqpmAnaqmapi# dahatyaiqndrENE$ndriqyamAqtman dha#ttEq mucya#tE pAqpmanOq Bava#tyEqva dyA#vApRuthiqvyA$M dhEqnumA la#BEtaq jyOga#paruddhOq &nayOqrqq.hi vA  EqShO&pra#tiShThiqtO&thaiqSha jyOgapa#ruddhOq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI Eqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq tE Eqvaina#M pratiqShThAM ga#mayataqH pratyEqva ti#ShThati paryAqriNI# Bavati paryAqrIvaq hyE#tasya# rAqShTraM ~MyO jyOga#paruddhaqH samRu#ddhyai vAyaqvya#M - [  ]  27
